    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Object findByPath(Site site, String path)
      Finds the object associated with the given site and path.
      static Object findObject(Site site, String path)
      Deprecated. 
      Use findByPath(com.psddev.cms.db.Site, java.lang.String) instead. Note that the new version doesn't return a directory object.
      static com.psddev.dari.db.Predicate hasPathPredicate()
      Returns a predicate that can be used to filter out any objects that doesn't have a path.
